sources.sass\\utils\\_variables.scss:
$main-orange: rgba(255, 107, 9, 1); //all orange color
$main-black: rgba(17, 21, 24, 1); //all black color beside flame and text in warranty
$main-grey: rgba(185, 185, 185, 1); //all grey color
$full-white: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); //white color
$secondary-black-color: rgba(
  61,
  61,
  61,
  1
); //flames in problems section and text in warranty colors
$guarantee-bg: rgba(241, 241, 241, 1); //guarantee background color

$box-shadow: -5px 8px 26px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04); //box-shadow in problems and benefits
$box-shadow-cards: 0px 8px 26px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); //box-shadow in how we do cards

$mobile-screen: 480px; //mobile resolution
$tablet-screen: 768px; //tablet resolution
$desktop-screen: 1280px; //desktop resolution
